13  KSGenPositionMask::KSGenPositionMask() :
14  fGenerator(NULL),
15  fMaxRetries(10000)
16  {}
17  KSGenPositionMask::KSGenPositionMask(const KSGenPositionMask& aCopy):
18  KSComponent(),
19  fAllowedSpaces(aCopy.fAllowedSpaces),
20  fForbiddenSpaces(aCopy.fForbiddenSpaces),
21  fGenerator(aCopy.fGenerator),
22  fMaxRetries(aCopy.fMaxRetries)
23  {}
24  KSGenPositionMask* KSGenPositionMask::Clone() const
25  {
26  return new KSGenPositionMask(*this);
27  }
28  KSGenPositionMask::~KSGenPositionMask() {}

30  void KSGenPositionMask::Dice(KSParticleQueue* aPrimaries)
31  {
32  KSParticleQueue *tTempQueue = new KSParticleQueue();
33  tTempQueue->push_back(new KSParticle());
34 
35  for(KSParticleIt tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); ++tParticleIt)
36  {
37  KThreeVector tPosition;
38  bool tPositionValid = false;
39  unsigned int tNumRetries = 0;
40 
41  // loop until valid position has been found
42  while (! tPositionValid)
43  {
44  tNumRetries++;
45  if (tNumRetries >= fMaxRetries)
46  {
47  genmsg(eError) << "failed to find valid position after " << tNumRetries << " retries, error in generator configuration?" << eom;
48  }
49 
50  fGenerator->Dice(tTempQueue);
51  tPosition = tTempQueue->back()->GetPosition();
52  tPositionValid = true;
53 
54  // check if position is not inside any of the forbidden spaces
55  if (fForbiddenSpaces.size() > 0)
56  {
57  tPositionValid = true;
58  for(auto tSpaceIt = fForbiddenSpaces.begin(); tSpaceIt != fForbiddenSpaces.end(); ++tSpaceIt)
59  {
60  if ((*tSpaceIt)->Outside(tPosition) == false) // inside forbidden space
61  {
62  tPositionValid = false;
63  break;
64  }
65  }
66 
67  if (! tPositionValid)
68  {
69  genmsg_debug( "diced position " << tPosition << " is inside at least one of the forbidden spaces, will retry" << eom);
70  continue;
71  }
72  }
73 
74  // check if position is inside at least one of the allowed spaces
75  if (fAllowedSpaces.size() > 0)
76  {
77  tPositionValid = false;
78  for(auto tSpaceIt = fAllowedSpaces.begin(); tSpaceIt != fAllowedSpaces.end(); ++tSpaceIt)
79  {
80  if ((*tSpaceIt)->Outside(tPosition) == false) // inside allowed space
81  {
82  tPositionValid = true;
83  break;
84  }
85  }
86 
87  if (! tPositionValid)
88  {
89  genmsg_debug( "diced position " << tPosition << " is not inside any of the allowed spaces, will retry" << eom);
90  continue;
91  }
92  }
93  }
94 
95  genmsg( eNormal ) << "found valid position " << tPosition << " after " << tNumRetries << (tNumRetries>1?" tries":" try") << eom;
96  (*tParticleIt)->SetPosition(tPosition);
97  }
98 
99  delete tTempQueue;
100  }
101 
102  void KSGenPositionMask::AddAllowedSpace(const KGeoBag::KGSpace* aSpace)
103  {
104  fAllowedSpaces.push_back(aSpace);
105  }
106 
107  bool KSGenPositionMask::RemoveAllowedSpace(const KGeoBag::KGSpace* aSpace)
108  {
109  for(auto tSpaceIt = fAllowedSpaces.begin(); tSpaceIt != fAllowedSpaces.end(); ++tSpaceIt)
110  {
111  if((*tSpaceIt) == aSpace)
112  {
113  fAllowedSpaces.erase(tSpaceIt);
114  return true;
115  }
116  }
117  return false;
118  }
119 
120  void KSGenPositionMask::AddForbiddenSpace(const KGeoBag::KGSpace* aSpace)
121  {
122  fForbiddenSpaces.push_back(aSpace);
123  }
124 
125  bool KSGenPositionMask::RemoveForbiddenSpace(const KGeoBag::KGSpace* aSpace)
126  {
127  for(auto tSpaceIt = fForbiddenSpaces.begin(); tSpaceIt != fForbiddenSpaces.end(); ++tSpaceIt)
128  {
129  if((*tSpaceIt) == aSpace)
130  {
131  fForbiddenSpaces.erase(tSpaceIt);
132  return true;
133  }
134  }
135  return false;
136  }

138  void KSGenPositionMask::SetGenerator(KSGenCreator* aGenerator)
139  {
140  fGenerator = aGenerator;
141  }

143  void KSGenPositionMask::SetMaxRetries(unsigned int& aNumber)
144  {
145  fMaxRetries = aNumber;
146  }
147 
148  void KSGenPositionMask::InitializeComponent()
149  {
150  if( fGenerator == NULL )
151  genmsg(eWarning) << "no generator defined to apply position mask" << eom;
152  else
153  fGenerator->Initialize();
154 
155  if( fForbiddenSpaces.size() + fAllowedSpaces.size() == 0 )
156  genmsg(eWarning) << "no forbidden or allowed spaces defined, position masking will not be effective" << eom;
157  }
158  void KSGenPositionMask::DeinitializeComponent()
159  {}
160 
161 }
